attributes.action: Abolish the BBC element of the TV license fee and make it subscription based.
attributes.additional_details:
A lot of people already have turned to streaming through other sites to stop paying the fee, because they already pay a fee to watch their content.

In this modern age, we need to either abolish this fee altogether, or make it into a packaged fee, where there is a small fee for the performing arts sector, and those who want to watch BBC can pay the higher fee.
attributes.background: The majority of the people of the UK hereby call upon the government to abolish the BBC element of the TV licence fee, they keep putting up price hikes at a time when a lot of the general public can’t afford it, with the already inflated taxes.
